otherNames: 末世神级升级系统, End-Times Divine-Level Upgrade System, Apocalyptic God Level Upgrade System, 末世神级升级系统 动态漫画 第1季
synopsis: "As long as I level up ten more times, I can activate the genetic lock again. By then, I'll be able to destroy this planet!" Traveling through the future, reborn into the body of a bottom-ranking loser in an academy, in this strange world where beasts coexist, Lin Xiu unexpectedly gains an upgrade system, surpassing the limits of the human body, devouring the stars!
